title: Citigroup to Exit Mexico Consumer Banking Business
sub_head: CEO Jane Fraser has been trying to simplify the bank, concentrating on wealthy consumers and companies
body:
Citigroup Inc. will exit its Mexico consumer banking business, the latest strategic shift by Chief Executive Jane Fraser.
The bank said Tuesday it would exit consumer, small-business and middle-market banking in Mexico, a business best known as Banamex. Citigroup said the change was part of its continuing “strategic refresh.”
